# TimedText:OneRepublic - All the Right Moves.ogg.en.srt

1
00:00:00,100 --> 00:00:03,250
All the right moves and all the right faces
2
00:00:03,250 --> 00:00:06,100
So yeah, we're going down
3
00:00:06,100 --> 00:00:09,100
Let's paint the picture of the perfect place
4
00:00:09,100 --> 00:00:12,200
They've got it better than what anyone's told you
5
00:00:12,200 --> 00:00:15,300
There'll be the King of Hearts, and you're the Queen of Spades
6
00:00:15,300 --> 00:00:19,000
Then we'll fight for you like we were your soldiers
7
00:00:19,000 --> 00:00:22,200
I know we got it good, but they got it made
8
00:00:22,200 --> 00:00:23,300
And the grass is gettingâ€”
